greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficients of ménage hit polynomials.
reference: J. Riordan, An Introduction to Combinatorial Analysis, Wiley, 1958, p. 197.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
formula: It appears that a(n) = round(4*n*exp(-2)*(BesselK(n-1,2)+BesselK(n,2))) when n >= 10. - _Mark van Hoeij_, Oct 25 2011
mathematica: p[n_] := Sum[2*n/(2*n-k)*Binomial[2*n-k, k]*(n-k)!*(x-1)^k, {k, 0, n}] // CoefficientList[#, x]&; Array[p, 25][[All, 2]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 08 2016 *)
xref: A diagonal of A058087. Cf. A000179.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Simon Plouffe_
